body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following initials is in the pinyin for the word in the audio?
body.correct: Outstanding job! The 3rd character 课 of the word in audio 英文课 yīngwénkè (English class) has initial “k.”
body.incorrect: Oops...Listen to the word again. Identify all three initials in the word, and then compare it with the initials in the choices.

body.quiz: Which of the following images best describes the word in the audio?
body.answer: Class chalkboard with Chinese written on it©iStock
options: Image of science class ©iStock
Image of music class ©iStock
A girl writing answers in math class©Shutterstock
body.correct: Outstanding job! The word 中文课 zhōngwénkè means “Chinese class.” From the images in the choices, the 1st shows the content taught being Chinese. Do you recognize some of the Chinese characters on the board? :)
body.incorrect: Almost there…Listen again several times, and think about what the word means. Look at the images in the choices, then decide which one can be best described by the word.

body.quiz: Which of the following school supplies is most likely needed for the class indicated in the audio?
body.correct: You got it! 数学课 shùxuékè means “math class,” and the most common school supply you will need for it is the calculator.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the audio several more times to find out what school subject it represents. Then think about what will be needed if you go to that class.

body.quiz: Which of the following topics is most likely to be learned in the class indicated in the audio?
body.answer: What is the domestic etiquette of modern Americans?
options: How do you pronounce the initial “ch” in pinyin?
How does music affect animal behavior?
What are the major genres of modern music?
body.correct: You got it! 社会研究课 shèhuìyánjiūkè means “social studies (class).” An appropriate topic to be discussed in that class would be something related to the human society.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the audio again to identify what school subject it represents. Then think about what you will most likely discuss in that class.

body.quiz: Which of the following classes has the most different physical requirements than the class indicated in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 体育课 tǐyùkè
options: Audio for 社会研究课 shèhuìyánjiūkè
Audio for 英文课 yīngwénkè
Audio for 数学课 shùxuékè
body.correct: Excellent job! The word 科学课 kēxuékè means “science class,” and of all classes in the choices, only 体育课 tǐyùkè (physical education class) requires great amounts of physical movements.
body.incorrect: Not quite…listen to the audio several times to identify what class it represents, then consider the classes in the options. Imagine yourself in these classes and consider in which one you will do things differently.
